transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji. Sudhir ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Sudhir ji Alankrit baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Sir wo abhi aapne wo waha pe call kiya tha na sir to waha pe call kyun kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Are ye hua tha ki matlab jaise ki koi main material matlab kuch maine search kara tha to IndiaMART se kuch whatsapp aaya tha usse whatsapp ke through maine diye the to mujhe number koi diya tha maine kaha tha dusra number usko manga to usne mujhe isliye main assistant ka de diya number isliye maine us par call kiya to aapko lag gaya tha baat ye tha.
Executive: To aapne na ek ticket open kar diya uska concern open ho gaya ek.
Executive: Hai na aapne ye requirement dali thi iski has been sent to Lokas electronic ko aapne requirement dali thi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hai na ye aaj hi kiya na sir?
Customer: Haan ji tha uske through.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji haan ji suniye.
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji main ye keh raha tha ki aapne wo galti se open kar diya tha concern hai na aapko aapko koi problem to nahi hai na abhi service se?
Customer: Abhi to nahi hai sab chala mujhe.
Executive: Abhi sahi aa rahi hai lead?
Customer: Haan aa rahi hai matlab ki jaise Uday ji se baat hui thi bata rahe the haan theek aa rahi hai leads abhi.
Executive: Uday sir se baat hui thi wo bata rahe the theek sahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan. Agle month bhi le lega koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekho agar aapko lene ki to mujhe pata hi hai sir dekho renew to karoge hi kahin na kahin achcha khasa aapko jo response hai wo to dikhaya hi hai. Bas thoda sa jo hai kaam kiya to aapko usme dekho dekhne ko mil gaya samne se. Main to unke sath premium service ke liye bol raha hu jisme ki hamare pass conversion bhi ho. Abhi samne se buyer to aa raha hai sab kuch ho raha hai lekin conversion bhi thoda sa hamare pass ho na.
Customer: Hmm. Dekho achcha buyer aayega to achcha conversion dekhne ko milega sale dekhne ko milega.
Customer: Wo to sahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukna sir. Ek minute ek minute.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ye apne page pe jitne buyer se aap baat kar rahe ho na.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Jitne bhi logo se aapki baat hoti hai lead manager pe. 24 ghante baad waha pe aapko rating review lene ka option aa jata hai. Upar teen dot pe aap unke chat open karoge lead manager pe teen dot upar dikhte hain waha pe click karoge.
Customer: Usme aata hai lumpsum char type se aata hai usme lead aata hai by lead aata hai aise kuch aur hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi dekho lead manager pe aap jate ho na jitne bhi logo se aapki baat hui.
Executive: Unse review lene ka waha pe option hota hai. Ki aap unse review mang sakte ho aapse jo unka jo experience raha hai uska.
Executive: Samjhe nahi samjhe theek hai. Dekho jaise aapne buyer se baat kari.
Customer: Haan ji. Samjh rahe ho. Aapne kisi buyer se lead manager pe aapne lead uthai lead manager pe usse baat kari.
Executive: Hai na ab wo lead pe baat karne ke baad aapke pass kya hai samne se response aata hai.
Executive: Waha pe se aap usse review le sakte ho.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Hello zara. Hai sir dhyan khali. To theek hai meri.
Customer: Hello. Sir awaaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji haan ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hello awaaz aa rahi hai na sir?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji main ye keh raha tha ki sir dekho ek aad cheeze aur thi jo baat karni thi aapse sab usse se related.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Abhi
Executive: Hello
Executive: Rukna. Sir awaaz na ruk jata hai.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Awaaz na aapko thoda ruk jata hai. Abhi abhi to nahi ruk raha hai na abhi to aa raha hai na.
Customer: Haan ji boliye. Abhi aa rahi hai na awaaz?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Mera trust jo hai wo build up hota rahega.
Executive: Reviews aapni haan sab apne ho jata hai sab.
Executive: Hello. Thank you sahi network aata hai.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Aapki awaaz nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called regarding an issue with IndiaMART.

- Wants to know about review option on lead manager.

- Customer mentions voice is breaking.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for the call.

- Executive explained review option on lead manager.

- Executive confirmed the customer is getting leads.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, review, lead manager, subscription
